medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient has a 2-week history of chronic abdominal pain that has worsened over the last few days but has not prevented him from performing any of his activities.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of non-Hodgkin's lymphoma, erosive gastritis requiring blood transfusions, epididymitis, hypertension, prior lymph node biopsies, surgery for intussusception as a child, and cholecystectomy.
medical_history.family_history: Grandmother had some sort of cancer; grandfather had stomach cancer and died at an unspecified age; mother has heart disease; both mother and father are alive and well; one brother and one sister are alive and well.
